text: Hey John, I've noticed that the former caregiver Sarah has been really creative with the activities lately. The clients seem to enjoy it a lot!
I'm a bit concerned about the former caregiver Sarah's documentation. Some details are missing in her reports.
The clients were thrilled with the garden project the former caregiver Sarah organized. It's great to see such engagement.
The former caregiver Sarah's attention to detail has been slipping. Not sure what's up, but it's noticeable.
Loved the art session the former caregiver Sarah led. She really knows how to bring out the creativity in our clients.
